value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Now that we've made it to
Niðavellir's castle, will you
guide us in, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... I have a feeling Fáfnir would
go to the throne room. Follow me.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Wow... Everything in this castle
is entirely different from the castle
in Askr. Incredible.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|There are similarities though too.
They also have portraits lining
their hallways. See?$k$pThese must be your ancestors,
right, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|These are the names of those that
contributed most to Niðavellir's
development. Seiðjárn researchers.$k$pAlfrik, Dvalinn, Billingr, Grer...$k$pNiðavellir was able to grow into
something great because of their
works, what they created...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|For that same technology to be used
to torture the king and invade other
kingdoms is a shame...$k$pI doubt they would have wanted this
to happen.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You're right... I've been thinking a lot
lately about how, before all of this,
maybe I could have done more...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Princess Reginn! You've done
everything you could!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Take it from me: turning against your
own siblings is never easy.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hm. Speak for yourself, Dagr!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Not everyone is as soulless as you
are, Nótt! When I—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A-anyway! You fought for Niðavellir
and got this far, right?$k$p$EFace_Smile|If you ask me, you've done as much
as anyone could have.$k$pAnd $Nu agrees!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Sharena, Princess Dagr,
Princess Nótt... Prince Alfonse,
$Nu, all of you...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|Thank you. I'm so happy I met
and got to know you all...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_マリス,ch01_47_Maris_F_Normal,Face|I'm Malice, a mercenary. Want to
hire me? It don't come cheap.$k$p$Sbs1000|
